actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to make postsecondary vocational institutions offering six-month programs of training to prepare students for gainful employment eligible for certain Federal student assistance programs.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to include within the definition of "institution of higher education" for student assistance purposes postsecondary vocational institutions which: (1) provide at least a six-month training program; (2) have been in existence at least two years; (3) are nationally accredited; and (4) are legally authorized nonprofit or public postsecondary educational institutions.

titles.title: A bill to make postsecondary vocational institutions offering six-month programs of training to prepare students for gainful employment eligible for certain Federal student assistance programs.
